Review Rating BMW is renowned for building cars that are great to drive but sometimes at the expense of comfort. read more High-class luxury car feel Superbly refined and quiet Outstanding handling Generous passenger room Forgiving ride Amazingly frugal 520d version Steering lacks some of the feel you'd expect from a BMW Review provided by: The following features are fitted on this car...
